parties.raw_snippet: THIS SERVICE AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES (this "Agreement") between Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund, a Delaware statutory trust ("Client") and Mellon Investor Services LLC (operating with the service name BNY Mellon Shareowner Services), a New Jersey limited liability company ("Agent"), is dated as of January 26, 2011.
parties.reasoning: The parties are explicitly identified in the opening paragraph of the agreement, with Client being Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund and Agent being Mellon Investor Services LLC.
normalized_value: Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund

contract_type.raw_snippet: THIS SERVICE AGREEMENT FOR TRANSFER AGENT SERVICES (this "Agreement") between Blackstone / GSO Long-Short Credit Income Fund, a Delaware statutory trust ("Client") and Mellon Investor Services LLC (operating with the service name BNY Mellon Shareowner Services), a New Jersey limited liability company ("Agent"), is dated as of January 26, 2011. 1. Appointment. Client appoints Agent as its transfer agent, registrar and dividend disbursing agent and Agent accepts such appointment in accordance with and subject to the following terms and conditions for all authorized shares of each class of stock listed in Exhibit A hereto (the "Shares"). 3. Duties of Agent. Commencing on the Effective Date, Agent shall provide the services listed in Exhibit B hereto, in the performance of its duties hereunder.
contract_type.reasoning: The agreement is titled 'Service Agreement for Transfer Agent Services' and Section 1 explicitly appoints the Agent to provide transfer agent, registrar, and dividend disbursing services. Section 3 references services in Exhibit B. The core substance is the provision of specialized financial services (transfer agent services) in exchange for fees, making this a Service Agreement rather than an Agency Agreement (which typically involves sales/business development representation).

notice_period.raw_snippet: Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms
notice_period.reasoning: Section 2 specifies that the agreement automatically renews unless either party provides notice at least 60 days before the end of the current term. This is the notice period required to terminate the auto-renewal mechanism.

expiration_date.raw_snippet: Agent's appointment hereunder shall commence on the next business day after the later of (i) the date hereof, or (ii) the date Agent has confirmed that Client's records have been converted to Agent's system (the "Effective Date"), and shall continue for three years thereafter (the "Initial Term").
expiration_date.reasoning: Section 2 establishes that the agreement runs for three years from the Effective Date. The Effective Date is defined as the later of the contract date or system conversion completion date. Since this is a relative term based on the Effective Date, I preserve it as written rather than calculating a specific calendar date.

renewal_term.raw_snippet: Unless either party gives written notice of termination of this Agreement at least 60 days prior to the end of the Initial Term, or any successive three-year term, this Agreement shall automatically renew for successive additional three-year terms
renewal_term.reasoning: Section 2 explicitly states that the agreement automatically renews for successive three-year terms unless notice is given. This creates an auto-renewal structure with three-year renewal periods.
